pullRequest.body:
If `P` is a property of ring homomorphisms, we call `Locally P` the closure of `P` with
respect to standard open coverings on the (algebraic) target (i.e. geometric source). Hence
for `f : R â†’+* S`, the property `Locally P` holds if it holds locally on `S`, i.e. if there exists
a subset `{ t }` of `S` generating the unit ideal, such that `P` holds for all compositions
`R â†’+* Sâ‚œ`.

By construction, `Locally P` is local on the target. Moreover, stability properties of `P` are inherited by `Locally P` (TODO).

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Deletions:

- ...

using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11178108897/job/31075021494)

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

Thanks :tada:

bors merge

```suggestion
/-- If `P` respects isomorphisms, to check `P` holds locally for `f : R â†’+* Sâ€¯`, it suffices
```

```suggestion
lemma locally_iff_of_localizationSpanTarget (hPi : RespectsIso P)
```
I think they could be useful elsewhere and they should not be private (and potentially live in a different file).
I gave them proper names and un`private`d. Not sure where these should go though, any suggestions? For now I just moved them to the top of this file in their own section.
What does find-home say? Maybe `Mathlib/RingTheory/Localization/Away/Basic.lean` near `Away.sec`?
`find_home` says `RingHom/Locally`. `Away.Basic` does not work, because it needs `Mathlib.RingTheory.Localization.Submodule`.
And the latter does not work either, because it does not know about `IsLocalization.Away`
You could open a new file under `Mathlib/RingTheory/Localization/Away/`, but I'm also okay with it being in this file. Please do what you see fit.
Okay, I made a new file `RingTheory.Localization.Away.Lemmas`.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(RingTheory): target local closure of property of ring homomorphisms
